TEXT.TITLE: CONTINENTAL GENERAL <CGIC> SETS STOCK DIVIDEND
TEXT.BODY: Continental General Insurance Co said its board of directors declared a 10 pct stock dividend on common shares, payable April one to shareholders of record March 16. The company yesterday paid a quarterly cash dividend of 2-1/2 cts a share, unchanged from the previous quarter, to shareholders of record February 20. Reuter
